title: Devasena Diamond Haaram with Ruby and Emerald Accents
materials: Natural Ruby (Padmaraagam) and Emerald (Paccha) gemstones. Showcasing exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a floral-inspired diamond setting, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The central pendant showcases a radiant Ruby, complemented by a vibrant Emerald, creating a striking contrast. The repeating floral motifs along the necklace echo traditional South Indian designs (pushpala alankaaralu), while the diamond setting adds a modern touch. The piece incorporates a closed setting to enhance the brilliance of each diamond. Featuring a broad and intricate structure.
colors: with vibrant accents of red (Ruby) and green (Emerald). A timeless South Indian color palette known for its auspiciousness.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for Seemantham
and other traditional Telugu ceremonies (Aacharaalu). Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for upscale modern events.
description: This Devasena Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones ensures lasting brilliance and value. The intricate design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibility, making it a versatile piece for any occasion. Owning this Haaram is not just owning jewelry; it's owning a piece of cultural heritage and artistic excellence (kalakriti).
